name: Act of War: Direct Action

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Act of War - Direct Action/ActOfWar.exe

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Act of War - Direct Action/ActOfWar.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
